entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 a.m. PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
